Class TestEngine

  • Object
    • TestEngine

  • public class TestEngine
extends Object
    Used to generated expected results by running against the solution and also used to grade student assignments once expected results have been generated. How to use to generate expected results:

    1. Copy TestEngine and TestSuite to package where solution resides. Add package statement to each as necessary.

    2. Write test methods in TestSuite.

    3. Set path variable so that expectedResults.txt will be located in the package. If using Eclipse, path="src\\soln_package\\" is probably what you want.

    4. Set shouldGenerateExpectedResults=true

    5. Run. This generates expectedResults.txt and also displays it to the console.

    6. Set shouldGenerateExpectedResults=false

    7. Run. You are grading the solution, thus, examine the console which shows the studentReport and make sure everything looks correct. If not, repeat these steps.

    How to use to grade a student assignment:

    1. Copy TestEngine, TestSuite, and expectedResults.txt to package where student solution resides. Add package statement to each as necessary.

    2. Set path variable so that expectedResults.txt will be located in the package. If using Eclipse, path="src\\student_package\\" is probably what you want.

    3. Set shouldGenerateExpectedResults=false

    4. Run. This generates studentReport.txt and also displays it to the console

    • Field Detail

      • gradeReport

        GradeReport gradeReport

      • shouldGenerateExpectedResults

        boolean shouldGenerateExpectedResults
        Set to true when generating expected results by running against the solution. Set to false when running against a student solution. Must have expected results file.

      • shouldSaveStudentReport

        boolean shouldSaveStudentReport
        Set to true to save assessment summary from running against student solution. This is optional because it always displays to console.

      • path

        String path
        Path to location where student assessment summary should be saved if shouldSaveStudentReport=true. Can ignore if set to false

      • studentReportFile

        File studentReportFile

      • expectedResultsFile

        File expectedResultsFile

        Returns:

      • generateTestResults

        private ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> generateTestResults()
        Run the test case methods.
        Returns:
        a list of results from teach test case method. Each method produces an ArrayList<String> of results. This return is the collection of all these lists.
